author: Editors of Whole Earth Catalog - final issue

quote: Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Who you have been ain't who you gotta be ...
author: Tim McGraw, song: "Emotional Traffic"

quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: I am bullish on the global development. I am bullish on billions of people getting out of poverty.
author: Marc Andreesen

quote: Only you can control your future.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I told Warren if he mentions Prop. 13 one more time, he has to do 500 push-ups.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Predicting rain doesn't count. Building arks does.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Choose based on what makes it easy to be the best version of yourself.
author: Doug Wells
